response.overview: The fourth installment in the Super!! Scary Psychic Video series. There is a little strange place. So, the photographer and his friends visited a certain spot, but there were no streetlights and it was the site of the excavation site that existed in the darkness wrapped in silence. Certainly, it is an extraordinary and mysterious place, but the place that can be said to be a superb view feels creepy in the dark. No, it may be because of the atmosphere of the place, not only the atmosphere that makes you feel creepy, but also the mysterious figure approaching the contributor.
response.tagline: A signal from a different world that is entering into a small gap in daily life, anniversaries and memories.
response.title: Super!! Scary Psychic Video 4
